dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Barrier Paper; Insulating Paper; Interleaving Paper; Packing Paper; Wrapping Paper
Barrier Paper; Insulating Paper; Interleaving Paper; Packing Paper; Wrapping Paper
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The Separator Paper Coil refers to a specific product flow characterized by coiled paper used to separate individual items during packaging or other industrial processes. It outlines the manufacturing state, highlighting whether the paper is virgin or recycled, and indicating the treatments undergone such as bleaching or heat treating. Conformity to industry standards, quality gradation, intended application, and the production method are addressed. The description also notes the origin of raw materials and specifies whether the paper is delivered as a production or consumption mix. The point of transfer, either to the end consumer or at the production facility, is mentioned, all detailed with clarity.
分隔纸卷指的是在包装或其他工业流程中用于隔离单独物品的卷状纸张的特定产品流。它描述了制纸的状态，突出纸张是初生的还是再生的，并指出经过的处理，如漂白或热处理。它符合行业标准、质量等级、预定应用以及生产方法。描述还涉及原材料的来源，并指定纸张是以生产混合物还是消费混合物的形式交付。转移点，不论是最终消费者还是生产设施，都已明确说明。
